title: Strong metal-support interactions of TiO2 interface-loaded Pt constructed under different atmospheres for adjusting the hydrogen storage reaction performance of N-ethylcarbazole
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,27310-27322
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03386H, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Zhengjian Hou, Ke Wu, Huijie Wei, Hua Chi, Yanyan Xi, Lishuang Ma, Xufeng Lin
Two types of Pt catalyst were prepared by treating commercial TiO2 supports in different atmospheres, followed by the adding Pt nanoparticles. They were applied to catalytic hydrogenation/dehydrogenation cycles of N-ethylcarbazole.
